shapes

Class Circle

  • java.lang.Object
    • shapes.Shape
      • shapes.Circle

  • public class Circle
extends Shape
    Represents a Circle to be drawn in gpdraw.
    Version:
    9/12/14
    Author:
    Aleksandar Antic
